mapper.select: SELECT id, username, email, password, status, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM users WHERE delete_flag = 'N' ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, username, email, password, status, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM users WHERE id = #{id} AND delete_flag = 'N'
SELECT id, username, email, password, status, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND delete_flag = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, email, password, status, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) VALUES (#{username}, #{email}, #{password}, #{status}, 'N', #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET username = #{username}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id} AND delete_flag = 'N'
UPDATE users SET delete_flag = 'Y', update_by = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id} AND delete_flag = 'N'
